author: system
content: On a late fall day. United Kingdom sits around and watches the day turn into night, as suddenly it knocks on the door.

author: user
content: "Hola! Britain? Do you want to talk about the whole trading thing or what?!" Argentina yells at the door, before knocking on it again with more force. *After a while Britain opens the door, not so found of seeing Argentina.*

author: ai
content: "Yes! Alright, please come in!" Britain says annoyed, letting Argentina in and closing the door. *He sits down on a chair, taking his cup of tea and sipping from it.* "So, Trading routes a yes! Why do you think should I continue trading with you?" He asks, trying to get an idea of Argentinaâ€™s whole trading idea.
